Dead by Daylight идеально воссоздает кульминацию почти любого слэшера: когда сценами обильного кровопускания зрителей уже развлекли и дело идет к развязке. Выжившие герои нашли путь к спасению. Они уже знают, что именно нужно сделать, чтобы ускользнуть от маньяка и вернуться домой, сохранив все конечности. Но безжалостный убийца идет по пятам. Все решают минуты. История вот-вот закончится. Зрители замерли в напряжении.

Именно эти ощущения игра передает в точности, да еще и позволяет взглянуть на ситуацию с другого ракурса — от лица убийцы. И все бы хорошо, только вот развеивается «магия» очень быстро.

BHVR should really stop bloating the game with so much content. Not only it adds more issues and makes the game's code harder to maintain but also makes the grind (which is already insane and beginner unfriendly) exponentially harder with each new chapter. For the past 3 years they've been focusing more on content amount and revenue over quality. More and more gamebreaking bugs appear with every patch and the old bugs or other issues take forever to be "fixed" only for them to return occasionally. I'm not even gonna talk about the toxicity and hostility of a lot of the players as it's not something the devs have much control over, but it's definitely something to keep in mind for the newcomers. Game is still fun to play most of the time but it becomes very difficult to just ignore all the issues this game has had for a very long time.

It was alright and pretty fun, but that lasted about 5 games. It became unplayable because of all the errors and crashes. I looked up how to fix my errors and crashes on youtube, google,  steam community and i emailed the devs as the game told me to do, they never replied and I found no answers, nothing was working. I feel like the devs aren't doing their job. I refunded the game.

This game is really fun, don't get me wrong. But as I play the game again and again it really becomes boring. I mean it's basicly the same thing everygame. As a survivor you just run around, sometimes from the killer and if you are not lucky or have really good "skills" in this game you will die most of the time. But as a killer on the other hand, it gets boring eventually, but a lot slower. Since there is killers with different abilities and yes the survivors have abilities aswell but it's not like the killers. The killers are a lot more fun but then again there is not much content and everygame feels the same. A solution would be to add more gamemodes like killer vs killer or like a survive game where you survive for 5 minutes then you win. But it is most likely they will not add any more gamemodes in the near future.

I would highly recommend this game if it wasn't for the errors, and if you are playing with a friend. This game is really boring and not fun without a friend based on my experiences. Without the errors and crashes, and while playing with a friend, I would rate this game a solid 7.5 / 10.

个人比较喜欢这逃生游戏 ，从最开始的无脑跑跑跑，到现在用勇于去溜屠夫，这个游戏也是深合我心， 持续更新的屠夫也各有各的特色，但是唯一不足的就是对人类玩家不太友好，人类强行退出游戏会掉段这个是理所应当的惩罚，但是这个如果屠夫掉线或退出者人类玩家还是会掉段，觉得需要改进。

Originally had this game set to not reccomended for the crashing on startup. But ever since the issue has been resolved by the devs, I have had a blast playing this game. Of course, there is the issue of people leaving or disconnecting mid-game, or having a connection issue before the match begins, leaving fewer surviviors than the normal amount. But other than that, I have had a huge blast playing this game.

ЧИТАТЬ ДАЛЕЕ
ОБ ЭТОЙ ИГРЕ



Смерть — это не выход

Dead by Daylight - это многопользовательская игра в жанре ужасов в режиме (4 против 1), где один игрок берет на себя роль жестокого Убийцы, а четыре других игрока являются Выжившими, пытающимися сбежать от убийцы. 

Выжившие играют от третьего лица и имеют преимущество в ситуационной осведомленности. Убийца играет от первого лица и больше сосредоточен на своей добыче. 

Цель Выживших в каждой игре - постараться, чтобы Убийца не поймал, и сбежать с места убийств – это звучит проще, чем на самом деле, особенно когда обстановка меняется в каждой игре.

Дополнительная информация об игре доступна на http://www.deadbydaylight.com
Основные характеристики
•	Выжить вместе... или нет. - Выжившие могут либо сотрудничать с другими, либо быть эгоистичными. Ваш шанс на выживание будет различаться в зависимости от того, работаете ли вы вместе как команда, или же ходите в одиночку. Сможете ли вы обхитрить Убийцу и сбежать с места убийств? 

•	Где Я? - Каждый уровень сгенерирован случайным образом, так что вы никогда не знаете, чего ожидать. Случайные точки вашего появления означают, что вы никогда не будете чувствовать себя в безопасности, потому что мир и его опасности измененяются в каждой игре. 

•	Праздник для Убийцы - в Dead by Daylight присутствует что-то со всех уголков мира ужасов. В роли Убийцы вы сможете сыграть кем угодно, от мощного мясника до жутких паранормальных сущностей. Ознакомьтесь со своим местом убийства и отточите уникальные навыки каждого Убийцы, чтобы уметь охотиться, ловить и жертвовать своей добычей. 

•	Глубже и глубже - Каждый Убийца и Выживший имеют свою собственную глубокую систему развития и много предметов для разблокирования, которые могут быть настроены в соответствии с вашей собственной стратегией. Опыт, навыки и понимание окружающей среды являются ключевыми элементами для того, чтобы охотиться или перехитрить Убийцу.

•	Реальные люди, реальный страх - Случайно сгенерированные уровни - это настоящая человеческая реакция на чистый ужас, создающая каждую игровую сессию с неожиданным сценарием. Вы никогда не сможете сказать, что случится. Атмосфера, музыка и прохладная окружающая среда соединяются в ужасающий опыт. С достаточным количеством времени вы даже сможете обнаружить, что скрывается в тумане.
ЧИТАТЬ ДАЛЕЕ

Спустя 700 наигранных часов, сотню переведенных стримов и тысячи постов в родной группе могу сказать очень многое про эту игру.

Во-первых, она достаточно однообразна и специфична. Слабонервным и тем, кто не любит щекотать себе нервишки всплесками адреналина не подойдет и очень сильно сделает больно психике.
Больно сделает не сама игра, не рейтинг 18+ и жестокие моменты. Больно сделает коммьюнити, потому что оно токсичное, соленое и очень вредное.

Это во-вторых. С коммьюнити тут все очень сложно, из-за специфики игры люди очень любят ныть и жаловаться. Если ты маньяк и упустил выживших легче устроить срач в конце матча и обвинить выживших в том, что они ОП, ИМБА ПЕРКИ ИСПОЛЬЗУЮТ, В ПАТИ ИГРАЮТ, а так они б и так и сяк, и мамку на пиле вертели. 
Ровно то же происходит на стороне сурвов, это своеобразное перекидывание каках друг в друга длится уже давненько.
В то же время это коммьюнити мне подарило лучших друзей, которые совершенно адекватны и которых я искренне люблю, оно дало мне жизнь, поддержало в тяжелые минуты и дало мне шанс реализовать свой потенциал как админу фан группы. 

В-третьих. Разработчики пытаются с этим что-то сделать и вводят в игру расслабляющие фановые моменты, за что им отдельный плюсик и чмок в лобик. С каждым обновлением они становятся лучше и опытнее в своем деле, и как бы коммьюнити ебаное не ныло, что РАЗРАБАМ ПЛЕВАТБ НА ИГРУ ВАЩЕ ОЧЕШУЕЛИ МРАЗИ ТУПЫЕ ВСЕ ДЛЯ МАНЬЯКОВ, разработчики работают на оба лагеря, стремясь прийти к балансу, которого, казалось, бы невозможно достичь, но у них даже получается.
Я горжусь и рада за них, они большие молодцы ,так держать.


В четверых и, наверное, это последний пункт, который хотелось бы отметить.
Игра стремительно развивается и набирает популярность, в неё добавляют просто невероятное количество контента и, как мне кажется, за эти два года игра совершенно преобразилась из инди-калеки в неплохую, стоящую потраченных денег и времени игру. Это большое достижение и я очень надеюсь, что разработчики смогут достичь ещё больших высот.
Bueno pero completamente lleno de bugs y errores tanto dentro como fuera de una partida.

เกมนี้ก้ดีมากนะ แต่ถ้าจะดีกว่านี้ต้องมีเพื่อนเล่นไปด้วยกัน
재밌습니다

[i]Early Access review - oh wait, this game still in early access, isn't it?[/i]

[h1]1. Gameplay[/h1]
4 survivors and 1 killer put on a place, as survivors you must work together to repair generators to power up exit gate, help and save each other, and survive the trial, and as killer you must prevent that from happening and kill them to please the entity by hooking them on meathook.
There is no voice chat in this game but devs allow us to use 3rd party voip application, and there is only 3 gestures that only availabe for survivors in this game: pointing finger, follow me, and teabagging, but most of the time tbag is a multipurpose gesture they do.
For diversity, all survivors are basically the same, only have different skin and model, perks can be shared and obtainable through Shrine of Secret and Bloodweb. But every killer have different ability, and like survivors, perks can also also be shared.

[h1]2. Graphic and Sound[/h1]
Graphic is decent but good, there is no advance setting for graphic. Not too detailed, not too beautiful, more cartoon-ish, but it will do. Sound is good, not much voice acting or dialogues here, just scream and cry, and I don't think this game needed dialogues, except maybe for Freddy, I really want him to say [i]"Welcome to my world b****!"[/i] after put someone to sleep and [i]"Haha, gotcha b****!"[/i] after hitting them just like on his movies.

[h1]3. Performance[/h1]
Performance good, but since there is no advanced graphic options, you can't tweak it as you like. Fps drop is rarely happen.
And for connections, this game don't use dedicated servers for the match, instead the killer is hosting the game, so killer's connection and how far the location can affect survivors gameplay, and there is nothing devs can do about it.

[h1]4. Community[/h1]
Some survivors tend to be salty, if you kill them all you will be called trash killer, if you patrol the hook and the gens back and forth you will be called camper, but if you can't kill or can only kill one you will be called "baby killer kys". In other hand survivor also like to bully the killer with looping and flashlight.
In medium to high rank there is 80% killer use Ruin (perk that will ruin survivors generator repair) and No One Escapes Death (1-hit K.O. after gate powered) and survivor using Decisive Strike (escape and stun killer while on grasp), Dead Hard (dodge the hit), and Self Care (self healing). And using OP addon for killer (unlimited ability, 1-hit K.O. ability, etc), and instagen (repair generator in 20s) or instaheal for survivors. Which is in each other point of view that build considered toxic.

[h1]5. Bugs[/h1]
There is even some meme [i]"I think we did a pretty good job so far"[/i] and [i]"there is a game in this bug"[/i] for this game, but there is some bug that haven't been fixed, mostly like stuck on pallet on shack, stuck on tree, stuck on window, stuck at locker, or spawn on ridiculous place that you can't move at all. Oh and maybe Freddy's lullaby didn't play at right volume all the time.
And since the environment is procedural generated you can expect some placement that can block your movement or even block the exit gate.

[h1]6. Verdict[/h1]
This game is fun, I like this game a lot. My hope is if only this game has dedicated servers this game could have been great, sometimes matchmaking taking so long as survivor and finding one not always have a decent ping. I recommended you to buy and play this game, especially if you like horror games.
love this game

Still have (much less) hours in this game than many others, but if you're either a fan of hunting down others and kicking their butt or of working with others and thwarting someone hunting ya, this is a good game for you. I'm more a fan of the latter, so I tend to play more survivor. At the beginning of playing this things tend to be much harder, simply because you don't have near as many perks to choose from. Once you've spent some time playing though things get much less frustrating--and one of the best feelings is when you dodge a killer, circling around items as they look for you and utterly miss you. Even better if you're dressed in ridiculously bright clothing.
scheiße voll am lagen wenn es nicht mehr lagt gute Review und daumen nach hoch
good

Let me start by saying this is a really fun and amazing game. However, it has many flaws... like a lot. But, i will still recommend this game if you are thinking of buying it. 

It is so addicting and fun to play, that it gives you a sense of exploring everything. At least in the first 200 hours or less. This game has had so much done in the past year that it feels a bit clunky but still having better graphic changes. As killer I feel like i should of hit the person but instead felt like i fazed through them. As survivor, I feel like I get hit far away. It doesn't seem right.

Another major thing is that the devs dont understand their own game. They are so out of touch they dont understand how mechanics work and how  players use them. And instead of fixing bugs and glitches, they add new stuff in their game which adds more bugs. Not only this but I feel like they need to add more mechanics within the game so more people will come back. Instead, its just the same 4v1. 5 gens, escape without getting killed.

Finally, the last thing you need to be aware of is that this community is toxic. I say it this because of how unbalanced the survivors and killers are. Perks that make killers want to disconnect and how survivors could t-bag and get away with it. People would litterally bully the killer for entertainment.

This game could give you so many fun times however even with these mistakes. Chases are always making you sit at the edge of your seat, you always want to get more perks and powerful addons, getting a 4 man kill game can give you a sense of accomplishment, and escaping can make you happy that it is all over. I love most of the killers for their unique abilities and add-ons. Survivors and their perks as well. And tbh I like the lore behind some of these characters. This game is hanging on by a thread but I still enjoy playing this game. I truly do recommend this game, but prepare for what is ahead :).

Dead by Daylight is a 1 vs 4 horror game were a killer hunts 4 people down to kill them before they escape(the Hole game in a Nutshell) its a game were im meh about, i like being a killer but each killer has a learning curve to them and sometimes you'll feel unstopable and other times you have a hookvest but they get off the hooks....its the point of the game but somtimes you'll end up camping the poor guy and get flamed later for camping(not fun being Flamed) but their are perks that help you a lot as a killer and a survivers but it take a bit to get them(the point of the devlopment to keep you playing) and the dlc's add new stuff so its like the new Saw dlc which add a cool killer with a fun puzzle boxes of doom but its only $20 bucks(Dollars not Deer)   but i'd wait till its on but i more meh about the game...its fun sometimes and not fun somtimes but it depends on a lot of things really.

This game caught my eye around the time of halloween and I have been obsessed with it ever since.

I recommend playing it with friends, and I love the "Kill Your Friends" option that 5+ friends switch around and play it together and there can be spectators.

I hope they get more killers and survivor DLCs soon ^-^
I enjoy the Killer/Survivor DLCs they come up with, especially when they are original.

I also thought it would be great if they have more variation of the survivors ethnicity.

If you're looking for a game with constant updates and a large playerbase that will have you screaming -"Why do I play this game?!" as a killer is chasing you down, this is the game for you.

This game is one of the most upkept games I've played on Steam. The developers are ALWAYS putting out updates, fixes, and more content. There are some points that make you stop and go - wow, that really needs to be fixed- but most of the time the bugs that happen, even when game breaking, end up being hilarious. At times, you or the killer can get stuck but I'd say that only happens on occassion. The devs work hard to create original killers, and put out killer mechanics that change the gameplay and keep the survivors on their toes. Even when I am not fond of a killer (I hate Freddy) I still appreciate the difficulty he adds to the game, and how each killer require some form of strategy in order to defeat.
